lines.text: You know what love is backwards? It's E-V-O-L. Evil! Pure evil! Granted it's spelled differently, but it's the same thing.
We have been friends since like sperm.
Oh, you know what, I'm a little short.
No, not that way! I'm short of money. Um. Uh. OK. Have you ever had this dream in life?... And these things
, these stupid, stupid things could make all your dreams come true? That's what it's like with Brooke. Haven't you ever felt that way?
[Officer Austin throws the Trojan condom at Brad]
I'm vacating this switchlized adolescent display of hedenistic amorality.
Is it just you three, or is your entire gender mentally deficient?
It's pretty much all of us.
